title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Expected Behavior:
The selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item.

Observed Behavior:
When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of highlighting the selected item.
